hero.findRide: Find a Ride for Your Package

howItWorks.title: A Simpler Way to Ship
howItWorks.subtitle: Whether you're sending a package or driving a route, getting started is easy.

senderSteps.title: 1. Find a Trip
senderSteps.description: Search for transporters heading to your desired destination.

senderSteps.title: 2. Book Your Space
senderSteps.description: Send a booking request with your package details and wait for approval.

senderSteps.title: 3. Track Your Delivery
senderSteps.description: Coordinate with your transporter and track your package in real-time.

transporterSteps.title: 1. Post Your Trip
transporterSteps.description: List your upcoming journey, destination, and available space.

transporterSteps.title: 2. Approve Bookings
transporterSteps.description: Review and approve booking requests from senders.

transporterSteps.title: 3. Drive & Earn
transporterSteps.description: Complete your trip as usual and get paid securely after delivery.

features.sectionDescription: We're building a more efficient, affordable, and community-driven logistics network.

list.title: Up to 50% Cheaper
list.description: Senders save money by utilizing space in vehicles already on the road.

list.title: Earn On Your Way
list.description: Transporters can monetize their empty vehicle space, turning routine trips into profitable journeys.

list.title: Community-Driven
list.description: Built on trust, our platform connects you with a community of verified users.

list.title: Secure & Transparent
list.description: With secure escrow payments and a two-way review system, every transaction is protected.

testimonials.sectionDescription: Real stories from the people connecting through our platform.

list.name: Amina K.
list.quote: KargoConnect was a lifesaver! I needed to send a gift to my family in another city, and it was so much cheaper and faster than the post office.

list.name: Youssef B.
list.quote: I drive from Casablanca to Marrakech every week for work. Now, I cover my fuel costs and make extra money by carrying packages. The app is super easy to use.
